text: The opened in Abashiri, Hokkaidō, Japan in 1991. Dedicated to the various peoples of the North, across Eurasia and the Americas, the collection includes items relating to the Sámi, Nanai, and Northwest Coast Indians, as well as the more local Okhotsk culture and Ainu. ==See also== * Hokkaido Museum * Hakodate City Museum of Northern Peoples * List of Historic Sites of Japan (Hokkaidō) ==References== ==External links== * Hokkaido Museum of Northern Peoples * Hokkaido Museum of Northern Peoples Category:Museums in Hokkaido Category:Abashiri, Hokkaido Category:Museums established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in Japan
title: Hokkaido Museum of Northern Peoples
